=============
:::ENGLISH:::
=============
Language: Multilingual
Platform: Windows XP/Vista/7
License: Shareware (Patch)

Cyberlink PowerDVD Ultra MAX - one of the most popular and high quality software DVD-players. Its main advantages include high image quality, user-friendly interface with customizable skins and fit properly. In addition to watching movies from the CD-ROM drive (DVD and Video CD), PowerDVD lets you play the file formats supported by Windows Media Player, and MPEG1 and MPEG2. The program has all the features typical hardware DVD player Digital image scaling, continuous playback of the selected scene, setting markers to quickly find the desired scene, fast, etc. There is even a possibility, as subtitles in both languages simultaneously .

Features:
* High picture quality DVD movies
* Support for HD DVD and Blu-ray
* A large number of settings
Easy to use, well designed and easy to use interface
* Advanced video playback image
* Continuous playback of the selected episode
* Installation of bookmarks to quickly find the desired scene
* Remember to stop seeing
* Ability to display subtitles at the same time in two languages
* The ability to convert video format (16:9 or 4:3)
* Capture video frames from a BMP, PNG, JPG and GIF
* Use different surround modes
* Play most HD video formats (MPEG-4 AVC (H.264), MPEG-2 HD, WMV-HD and SMPTE VC-1)
* New support for HDMI 1.3
* Evaluation of films
* And much more

PowerDVD 10 offers the following new features:
* TrueTheater Technology improves quality based on standard DVDs to a level comparable to the HD. It also enables video stretching without distortion, a smooth and brighten the image;
* Cinema Mode lets you watch Blu-ray discs with Windows Media Center, and offers a conclusion navigation and information about the film on the external display;
* FancyView allows you to contribute to the library (collection of movies), not only DVDs, but also to their sections. Furthermore, this navigation tool supports not only the mouse and keyboard, but remote controls and touch screens;
* Film Library invites users to enter information about the Blu-ray Disc and DVD, and synchronize with the moovielive.com site;
* Support high quality audio formats Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio multi-channel speaker systems 7.1, and HDMI 1.3 compatibility;
* The ability to play Blu-ray discs, even in entry-level configurations.
